recipesJson.name: 'Nana Puddin'
recipesJson.author: tranceinate
recipesJson.description: Banana pudding with vanilla wafers - Can sub MF with NN Banana Cream Pie

reviews.text: Tested after a weeks steep, and it was good but not great, but after a month and a half this shit is amazing. So thick and creamy, and leaves an almost gooey/waxy mouth feel. Very, very good.
